# Changelog
All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/),
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

## [Unreleased]
## [16.0.1.1.2] - 2025-12-15
### Changed
- [#1605](https://git.coopdevs.org/coopdevs/som-connexio/odoo/odoo-somconnexio/-/merge_requests/1605) Update API schama with changes from somconnexio version 16.0.1.1.0

## [16.0.1.1.1] - 2025-11-21
### Fixed
- [#1673](https://git.coopdevs.org/coopdevs/som-connexio/odoo-somconnexio/-/merge_requests/1673) SR process: search single partner bank to assign

## [16.0.1.1.0] - 2025-11-19
### Added
- [#1637](https://git.coopdevs.org/coopdevs/som-connexio/odoo/odoo-somconnexio/-/merge_requests/1637) Add API to create cooperator subscription request from partner
- [#1581](https://git.coopdevs.org/coopdevs/som-connexio/odoo-somconnexio/-/merge_requests/1581) Add missing CHANGELOG

## [16.0.1.0.0] - 2025-05-26
### Added
- Migrate cooperator_api_somconnexio module to ODOO v16
